project.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT02-DF17-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT02-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C089C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT02-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="NewShipper" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
